code: import'./listcomponent.css';import Checkbox from'@material-ui/core/Checkbox';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{deleteItems,addItem,setItemsLoading}from"../../actions/itemAction";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ListComponent=function ListComponent(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var items=[useSelector(function(state){return state.item.items;})];var loading=useSelector(function(state){return state.item.loading;});if(loading){dispatch(setItemsLoading());}var handleInput=function handleInput(e){e.preventDefault();var name=document.getElementById('add_todo_input').value;dispatch(addItem({name:name}));document.getElementById('add_todo_input').value="";};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"list__components",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"add_new_todo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"add_todo_input",name:"name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"add_todo_button",onClick:handleInput,children:"Add"})]})}),items[0].map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo_item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Checkbox,{onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(deleteItems(item._id));},color:"default"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[" ",item.name]})]},item._id);})]})});};export default ListComponent;
